com.vangav.backend.properties

Class PropertiesLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.properties.PropertiesLoader

  • public class PropertiesLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    PropertiesLoader Loads all properties files and stores key:value pairs in memory
